original_text: The next day after the new moon, David's seat was still empty at the meal. So Saul said to his son Jonathan, ‘Why has Jesse's son not come to the meal? He did not come yesterday or today.’
korean_text: 이튿날 곧 그 달의 둘째 날에도 다윗의 자리가 여전히 비었으므로 사울이 그의 아들 요나단에게 묻되 이새의 아들이 어찌하여 어제와 오늘 식사에 나오지 아니하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: The next day after the new moon
sentences.korean_translation: 다음 날, 새 달의 다음 날

sentences.original_text: David's seat was still empty at the meal
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 자리는 식사에서 여전히 비어 있었다

sentences.original_text: So Saul said to his son Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사울은 자기 아들 요나단에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: 'Why has Jesse's son not come to the meal?'
He did not come yesterday or today.'
